name: yt_presence
description: YT Presence adds cool Features to YouTube/YouTube Music. Like for example Discord Rich Presence integration, Media controls and much more.

scripts.installer-mac: npm run pkgmac && electron-installer-dmg ./out/YT\ Presence-darwin-x64/YT\ Presence.app YT\ Presence\ Installer --overwrite --icon=./appIcon.icns --out=./dist

author: Timeraa
